meanings.sent1: The misadjusted clock showed the wrong time.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic fixed the misadjusted brakes on the car.
meanings.sent3: The misadjusted TV antenna made the news look like a puzzle.
meanings.sent4: Her misadjusted expectations led to disappointment.
meanings.sent5: The misadjusted guitar strings produced a discordant sound.
